title: Safe School Reopening in the COVID-19 Era: Blended Learning Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on blended learning models in language education domains, with most learners using smartphones as primary devices. Requires balancing health safety protocols and educational effectiveness upon school reopening.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a blended learning instructional design process incorporating COVID-19 safety protocols in three or more stages.
Learners can develop a language education module combining smartphone-based real-time interaction and asynchronous learning activities.
Learners can propose two or more blended learning strategies addressing the needs of vulnerable learners and special education populations.

resources: Public Health and Safety Guidelines Documentation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
